ygData.messageBody:
I wholeheartedly agree - we bards need to refuse to pay more than 20pp for a
Lambent Stone. I have several pieces of Lambent now and have hunted for all
but one of the stones. The one stone that I did purchase I purchased
because it was getting late and the HGs were being stingy with the Lambents.
I wanted the gauntlets before I logged, so when I saw someone auctioning one
for 25 I went ahead and bought it because I needed to be civil at work the
next day ;) If it hadn't been late I would've either dickered them down,
waited for one at 20pp, or gotten one myself.

Crier Sharpsong - 31st song bard on Fennin Ro


> John,
> With all due respect, this is why some jerks ask 100+pp for
> Lambent stones-I
> paid 10pp for a Lambent, the other 2 I have gotten so far were
> given to me.
> I refuse to pay more than 20, but when other bards pay 50, 60, or more for
> one it makes it harder to get the message across.
> My advice to you would be to be patient, you will find them for
> 20 pp, or I
> believe there are enough kind souls who will /shout looting rights to one.
>
> Scanna Swiftsinger
> Level 30 (and sick of it)
> Bertoxx Server
